title: Textile, late 16th–early 17th century
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 248 x 195 cm (8 ft. 1 5/8 in. x 6 ft. 4 3/4 in.); dimensions reflect size before separation of components
creditline: Gift of L. Boyd and Annie McQuarrie Hatch
description: Medium-scale classical urn and flowers in roughly ogival framework formed by stylized leaf sprays at angles and crowns at tangent points. Double cord selvages.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 16th–early 17th century.
late 16th–early 17th century. Medium: silk
Technique: 5-harness satin damask. Gift of L. Boyd and Annie McQuarrie Hatch. 1955-25-6-a/d.
